Who am I?

I'm a visual UX/UI Designer and Web Developer

A highly motivated and detail-oriented Full-Stack Developer with a proven track record of delivering robust, scalable, and user-centric web applications.

Proficient in both front-end and back-end technologies, including PHP, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Laravel, React, and MySQL. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams in environments that foster innovation, healthy competition, and professional growth. Adept at translating business requirements into technical solutions while maintaining a strong focus on performance, security, and usability.

Passionate about continuous learning and contributing to high-performing teams in a well-renumerated and collaborative workplace.
